CustomField.description: Used to help determine the round robin sub-segment.
CustomField.formula:
IF(OR((Number_of_Students__c >= 10000),(Number_of_Citizens__c >= 100000),(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Enterprise_Assignment__c))))),"ENT",
IF(AND(OR( BillingCountry = "CA", BillingCountry = "Canada"),OR (Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 31, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c >= 151, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c >= 51)), "AE2/AE3",
IF(OR(BillingCountry = "Mexico", BillingCountry = "MX"), "AE2/AE3",
IF(AND(OR(Global_Geography__c = "UK & I",Global_Geography__c = "France",Global_Geography__c = "DACH",Global_Geography__c = "Iberia",Global_Geography__c = "Italy",Global_Geography__c = "BENELUX"), OR(Customer_ARR__c > 0 , Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 21)),"AE2/AE3",
IF(Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 31 || Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c >= 151 || Number_of_Powered_Assets__c >= 51, "AE2/AE3",
IF((Number_of_Vehicles__c = 0 || ISBLANK(Number_of_Vehicles__c))&& ISPICKVAL(Industry,"Government"), "AE2/AE3", "AE1"))))))
CustomField.label: Account Size Segment
